name: Grapefruit Granité
recipeIngredient: 2 cups freshly squeezed red or pink grapefruit juice, strained
1 large red or pink grapefruit, peeled, white pith removed
Grated zest of 1 yuzu or 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the juice and Sauternes in a medium bowl. Add the sugar to taste and stir until dissolved. Pour into an 8-by-10-inch pan. Place in the freezer for several hours or until completely frozen. Meanwhile, segment the grapefruit, discarding the membrane. Cut each segment into quarters.
Scrape the ice with a thin-tined fork to create loose crystals. Transfer to a large, airtight container. Stir in the grapefruit segments. Freeze again.
To serve, divide the granité into six dessert bowls. Pour * teaspoon Grand Marnier over each and dust with zest.
